text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r06_line r07_phr

LMNL.text: One day I wrote her name upon the strand,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r08_line r09_phr

LMNL.text: But came the waves and washed it away:

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r10_line r11_phr

LMNL.text: Again I wrote it with a second hand,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_line r13_phr

LMNL.text: But came the tide,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r04_quatrain r05_s r12_line r14_phr

LMNL.text: and made my pains his prey.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r16_s r17_line r18_phr

LMNL.text: Vain man,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r16_s r17_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r16_s r17_line r19_phr

LMNL.text: said she,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r16_s r17_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r16_s r17_line r20_phr

LMNL.text: that dost in vain assay

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r16_s r20_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r16_s r20_phr r21_line

LMNL.text: A mortal thing so to immortalize!

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r22_s r23_line r24_phr

LMNL.text: For I myself shall like to this decay,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r22_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r03_octave r15_quatrain r22_s r25_line r26_phr

LMNL.text: And eek my name be wiped out likewise.

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r30_line r31_phr

LMNL.text: Not so (quoth I),

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r30_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r30_line r32_phr

LMNL.text: let baser things devise

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r32_phr
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r32_phr r33_line

LMNL.text: To die in dust,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r33_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r33_line r34_phr

LMNL.text: but you shall live by fame:

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r35_line r36_phr

LMNL.text: My verse your virtues rare shall eternize,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r29_quatrain r37_line r38_phr

LMNL.text: And in the heavens write your glorious name;

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r40_line r41_phr

LMNL.text: Where,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r40_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r40_line r42_phr

LMNL.text: whenas death shall all the world subdue,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r43_line r44_phr

LMNL.text: Our love shall live,

text.cf: r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r43_line
r01_sonneteer r02_sonnet r27_sestet r28_s r39_couplet r43_line r45_phr

LMNL.text: and later life renew.
